sentences.en: a seemingly unending supply of money
sentences.cn: 似乎源源不断的资金供应

sentences.en: All that was needed was an unending series of victories over your own memory.'
sentences.cn: 需要你做的,惟有不断战胜你的记忆而已.

sentences.en: An unending theme in my body of work.
sentences.cn: 是我工作的主要部分的永恒主旋律.

sentences.en: At any rate , I was very certain that I would not attempt to attain unending life.
sentences.cn: 任何情况下, 我都可以斩钉截铁地说:我自己是决不会追求什么永恒的生命的.

sentences.en: Folks do say that you are trying to discover the unending motion.
sentences.cn: 人家都在说,你是想要发现永久运动.

sentences.en: He said there was so much happening and the unending correspondence sometimes.
sentences.cn: 他说有时候发生那么多事情,还有没完没了的信件.

sentences.en: How can we stop the unending cycle of violence?
sentences.cn: 我们如何才能结束这种无休止的暴力事件?

sentences.en: I was sick and tired of the unending secrecy.
sentences.cn: 我对这种讳莫如深的神秘气氛感到十分厌烦.

sentences.en: I'm sick of your unending grumbles.
sentences.cn: 我对你的不断埋怨感到厌烦.

sentences.en: I'm tired of your unending complaints.
sentences.cn: 我厌倦了你那没完没了的牢骚.

sentences.en: Life consists of an unending cycle of happiness and pain.
sentences.cn: 人生是由循环不已的欢乐和痛苦组成的.

sentences.en: People are tired of the unending debate about tobacco.
sentences.cn: 人们厌倦了有关抽烟的无休止的讨论.

sentences.en: The glorious forms of the unending world stirred within my animated soul.
sentences.cn: 这无尽世界的灿烂形状在我激动的灵魂里跳跃.

sentences.en: To me the pageant of seasons is a thrilling and unending drama.
sentences.cn: 在我看来,一年四季的绚丽景色犹如一出无尽的动人的戏剧.
战争留给人们无尽的思索.

trans.tran_cn: 无止境的，不停的，不断重复的
trans.tran_en: something, especially something bad, that is unending seems as if it will continue for ever
